item.title: What are the Olympics Shooting Competitors Wearing On Their Faces? - Core77
item.description: If you happened across the Olympic Air Pistol event for the first time, you might've been puzzled by the competitors' eyewear: So those are mechanical irises. Shooting competitors fine-tune them to bring their gunsights into sharp focus.
